Data Fields
ILBLinearRGBA Struct Reference

This reference page is linked to from the following overview topics: Colors and Gamma Correction, Creating Classic Materials.

Search for all occurrences

#include <beastapitypes.h>

Class Description

Color with alpha definition All colors are expressed in linear space as opposed to gamma corrected.


Alpha values must be between 0 and 1.0.

Examples:

examples-physical/code/common/primitives.h, examples-physical/code/common/vecmath.h, examples/code/common/primitives.h, examples/code/common/vecmath.h, examples/code/common/xmlwriter.h, include/beastapi/beastapitypes.h, include/beastapi/beastmaterial.h, include/beastapi/beastmesh.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastmaterialwrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/mayautils.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastmaterialwrapper.cpp, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/mayautils.cpp.
